name: just-sticky-notes
description: 실시간 스티키 노트 커뮤니티 사이트 - Cloudflare Workers + R2 + WebSocket

scripts.upload-static: npm run upload-html && npm run upload-css && npm run upload-js
scripts.upload-html: wrangler r2 object put just-sticky-notes-storage/static/index.html --file index.html --content-type text/html
scripts.upload-css: wrangler r2 object put just-sticky-notes-storage/static/styles.css --file styles.css --content-type text/css
scripts.upload-js: wrangler r2 object put just-sticky-notes-storage/static/app.js --file app.js --content-type application/javascript
scripts.setup: npm run create-bucket && npm run create-preview-bucket && npm run upload-static
scripts.clean: wrangler r2 bucket delete just-sticky-notes-storage && wrangler r2 bucket delete just-sticky-notes-storage-preview

author: Luke
